definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: I have a sharpener. It is red.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個轉筆刀，它是紅色的。

sentences.english: He 'd like a pencil - sharpener, but she has not got one.
sentences.chinese: 他想要一個轉筆刀，但她沒有。

sentences.english: Functions in computer programming can be like pencil sharpeners.
sentences.chinese: 電腦程序的功能就像轉筆刀一樣。

sentences.english: And I'd like one those new electric pencil sharpeners.
sentences.chinese: 另外，我再想要一個那種新型的電動轉筆刀。

sentences.english: He'd like a pencil-sharpener, but she have not get one.
sentences.chinese: 他想要一個轉筆刀，但她沒有。
